attributes.action: withdraw the uk from future eurovision song contests
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: why do we keep sending the uk to the Eurovision when clearly most of Europe do not want us there, it wouldn’t of mattered if Scooch had been the best of the best, the uk still wouldn’t of received the recognition they deserved, put the money that was spent on getting us there back into Britain and make us proud to be part of something home grown, stop sending us to the Eurovision to get slaughtered time after time, the whole thing is just too political between the other countries

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
